text: Especia were a Japanese idol girl group formed in 2012. They participated in the 2015 Tokyo Idol Festival. Their single "Aviator/Boogie Aroma" reached the 28th place on the Weekly Oricon Singles Chart. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Albums Chart. !Ref. |- !colspan="4"|EP |- |November 30, 2012 |DULCE | - | |- |May 22, 2013 |AMARGA |52 | |- |February 18, 2015 |Primera |30 | |- |August 10, 2016 |Mirage |145 | |- !colspan="4"|Studio albums |- |May 28, 2014 |GUSTO |42 | |- |February 24, 2016 |CARTA |29 | |- !colspan="4"|Best-of album |- |March 22, 2017 |WIZARD |219 | |} ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Singles Chart. !Ref. |- |September 11, 2013 | Midnight Confusion (ミッドナイトConfusion) |49 | |- |January 8, 2014 | Ya.Me.Te! / Adventure wa Gin-iro ni (YA・ME・TE!/アバンチュールは銀色に) |34 | |- |July 22, 2015 | Aviator / Boogie Aroma |28 | |- |December 7, 2016 | Danger | - | |} ==DVDs== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon DVD Chart. !Ref. |- |October 1, 2014 |Viva Discoteca Especia 2014 |110 | |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:Japanese idol groups Category:Japanese girl groups Category:Musical groups established in 2012 Category:2012 establishments in Japan
